name: Remove ads in Cookie clicker
description: Hides all ads in Cookie clicker.
additional_info:
I've tested it with Chrome 34, Opera 21, Firefox 29 and IE 10. But it will probably work with other browsers too :-)


Changelog:
05-19-2014 - In 1.0465 the annoying panel was removed. But in beta it is still there. I also added support for dungeons beta.
05-18-2014 - Compatible with Cookie clicker 1.0464.
